name: ZOMI ADVENTURE
description:
Hi guys!! In this game I have first time worked with the unity terrain stuff... So maybe the terrain is kinda boring and lazily done. 

Perhaps it is not scary and perhaps not the best, but I'll hope that you so it.

I welcome all your comments for criticism and improvement in the game.

Game Sound Credits:
Sounds taken from freesound.org :

  • Zombie Sounds 
  • MainMenu BG Music
  • Gun Reloading
  • Gun Shot
  • In-game BG Music   

Game Assets Used :

  • Character Controller
  • Zombie Model and Animation
  • Terrain Textures
  • AK47 Gun Model
  • Tree Asset and Another Tree
  • Standard Assets
